akn:section.akn:heading: Uniform application of standards and rates

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3656. Uniform application of standards and rates The standards established pursuant to section 3653 of this title and the rates of basic pay established pursuant to section 3642 of this title shall be applied without regard to whether the employee or individual concerned is a citizen of the United States or a citizen of the Republic of Panama. (Pub. L. 96–70, title I, § 1216, Sept. 27, 1979, 93 Stat. 465; Pub. L. 105–85, div. C, title XXXV, § 3523(c)(1), Nov. 18, 1997, 111 Stat. 2065.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1997—Pub. L. 105–85 substituted “section 3642” for “section 3655”.
